articles.title: Monoclonal antibody therapy cuts LDL cholesterol by half in high-risk patients - Times Now
articles.description: The research team found that subcutaneous administration of the agent at 450 mg weekly resulted in LDL cholesterol lowering of 56 per cent, and 52.9 per cent at 300 mg weekly compared to the placebo group.
